desc: Nampons™ is the fastest and safest way to stop nosebleeds fast. Used by first responders and hospitals for years, Nampons™ are now available for consumers over-the-counter. If you suffer from epistaxis (nosebleeds), be prepared. Nosebleeds need Nampons™.

layout.text: Stop nosebleeds fast with our clinically proven, FDA registered treatment for mild to moderate nosebleeds.
